name: Mobile Home Rent Stabilization Ordinance
short_desc: Restricts mobile home space rent annual increases to 3%, or $10, or 60% of the Consumer Price Index, whichever is greater
description: Restricts mobile home space rent annual increases to 3%, or $10, or 60% of the Consumer Price Index, whichever is greater. Call 510-494-4500 or visit www.fremont.gov for more information.
